messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] tsuba for sale
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry guys...thought this went out private. Ron STL ... From: Ron Hartmann To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com Sent: Saturday, December 01, 2007 10:14 AM Subject:
messages.messageBody:
Sorry guys...thought this went out private.

Ron
STL

----- Original Message -----
From: Ron Hartmann
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, December 01, 2007 10:14 AM
Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] tsuba for sale


Richard -

Just turning on the computer for the day and found your tsuba sale. I'm on the run right now, but let me take another look at the Naoaki tsuba. I'm a big admirer of Naokatsu so this would fit nicely into my collection. Just must look more at it before deciding to drop a grand at this time of year. Looks quite nice! I once owned a mumei Naoaki, not realizing the connection at that time, and have always regretted selling it. But that was probaby 30 years ago!

Will be back a little later today...

Ron
----- Original Message -----
From: Richard Turner
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, December 01, 2007 2:28 AM
Subject: [nihontostudy] tsuba for sale

http://www.nihontokanjipages.com/personal/collection/tsuba-sale.html

All, I have listed some tsuba for sale. Several sold quickly and there
are now just 3 left.

Thanks for the bandwidth.

Best

Richard Turner
